title: Who goes good with Vayne for support
body:
Hey guys just wondering who goes good with vayne{{champion:67}} as a support 
Blitz or Sona??{{champion:53}} {{champion:37}}

replies.body: I like nami the best as a support. She locks down the ADC so you can get some well timed shots, and if she knows what she's doing she can flash behind them and ult them into you under tower so you can get a double. Plus she has some good heals and movespeed.
erm nami's ult just knocks people up...... it doesn't push anyone anywhere,., that's azir
someone who can both protect and set up kills for vayne (nami/thresh/blitz/alistar)
If you want really nice outplay potential in a duo lane try lulu/vayne,  so much synergy between the two, but getting through the early game can be tougher than if you had say Sona/Nami/Soraka

Blitz, Morg, Braum, Thresh, Leona, Janna.

I think, if you tryhard enough, make players go through Bard magikal journiezz.

hear me through.

E them into a wall, stun them. Bard makes a tunnel so that the poor stunned player is at the opening of the tunnel.

Walk right up to that player. They shouldn't be able to auto ( unless they use ~ but that's for nerds ) and will enter a magikal journiee. Free kills on support?

<3

idk, should work.
Hi there :) I personally love Janna + Vayne

These all work great in my opinion. :)

{{champion:53}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:25}}
I find lulu,janna and thresh work pretty well with her.
